user-filter.rules:
! AdGuard
!--- PERSONAL FILTERS DONT ADD TO LISTS ---!
||*facebook*^$all
||fbcdn.net^$all
||fbcdn-profile-a.akamaihd.net^$all
||fbcdn-*.akamaihd.net^$all
||fbexternal-*.akamaihd.net^$all
||*google*^$all,domain=~youtube.com|~accounts.google.com
||*youtube.com^$all,domain=~youtube.com
||*ytimg.com^$all,domain=~youtube.com|~accounts.google.com|discordapp.com
||*googlevideo.com^$all,domain=~youtube.com|~accounts.google.com|discordapp.com
||firebaseio.com^$all
||twitter.com^$all
||twimg.com^$all
||linkedin.*^$all
||googleapis.com^$all,domain=~youtube.com|~accounts.google.com
||gstatic.com^$all,domain=~youtube.com|~accounts.google.com
||appspot.com^$all
||cloudfront.net^$third-party,all
||bit.ly^$all
||bitly.com^$all
! From Anti Maps
||locuslabs.com^$all
||api.mapbox.com^$all
||mapbox.com^$all
||maps.google.com^$all
||mapquest.com^$all
||maps.yahoo.com^$all
||mapway.com^$all
||ud-prd.geohawk.co.uk^$all
||geohawk.co.uk^$all
||openstreetmap.org^$all
||openweathermap.org^$all
||apple.com/ios/maps/^$all
||cloud.google.com/maps-platform/^$all
||mirmay.com^$all
! Cloudflare (https://www.cloudflare.com/privacypolicy/)
||cloudflare.com^$all
||cloudflare-dns.com^$all
||one.one.one.one^$all
||1.1.1.1^$all
||1.0.0.1^$all
! No Scripts On .Gov Domains
||*.gov$script,inline-script
! Block Chinese Top-Level Domains (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_Internet_top-level_domains/)
||*.cn^$all
||*.mo^$all
||*.tw^$all
||*.hk^$all
||*.wang^$all
||*.unicom^$all
! Stores
||refer.walmart.com^$all
! Amazon Hosting
||*cloudfront.*^$all
||*aws.amazon.*^$all
! 000WebHost
||000webhost.com^$all
! Fonts
||*fontawesome.com^$all
||*font*^$all
*$font
! CSP
*$csp='upgrade-insecure-requests';
! AdGuard Specific
||cloudflare.com^$network,all
||cloudflare-dns.com^$network,all
||one.one.one.one^$network,all
||1.1.1.1^$network,all
||1.0.0.1^$network,all
! Cookies
*^$cookie=/.+/;maxAge=-999999,domain=~youtube.com|~accounts.google.com|~discordapp.com|~discord.gg|~pandora.com
*^$cookie=/lithiumSSO%3A[a-z]+.prod|_wamtcstandards|http_referrer|at/
! Cookies Expire So Login Is Required Every Page Load
pandora.com$cookie=/.+/;maxAge=360
!--- END PERSONAL FILTERS ---!
